parameters.name: serviceType

serviceType.

Valid values: tv, fm and am

post.summary: Specify contactType as "MS" for Main Studio Contact and "CC" for Closed Caption Contact.
post.description: Specify contactType as "MS" for Main Studio Contact and "CC" for Closed Caption Contact. Allowed values for contactSourceServiceCode are "TV", "AM" and "FM" for Main Studio Contact and "TV" for Closed Captions.

parameters.name: MainStudioUpdate
parameters.description: Specify contactType as "MS" for Main Studio Contact and "CC" for Closed Caption Contact. Allowed values for contactSourceServiceCode are "TV", "AM" and "FM" for Main Studio Contact and "TV" for Closed Captions.

formatParam.name: format
formatParam.description:
Format for the returned results.

Valid values: json, xml

callbackParam.name: callback
callbackParam.description: Callback parameter - required for jsonp requests.

fileName.description: New name of the specified file

newFolderId.description: Folder Id of the new file location.

phone.description: phone number with no spaces and hyphens

principalAddressInLocalFiles.description: Mandatory attribute indicating principal address specified in local files or not
